about_the_game:
HANA : Hide and seek

This RPG game is both cute, fun and horrifying. All chapters are full of mystery, and as you play along with Hyeon's character you will found yourself more and more in trouble. Slowly unraveling a tragic story. With a strange woman that's lurking around your home the entire time.
But luckily your friends have your back, and will help you through it all. Well, at least in spirit.

The game is interactive, with cut scenes, original artwork, puzzles waiting to be solved and mazes to escape.
Play the game now, and solve the mystery of the creepy woman. If you dare.


INTRODUCTION:
"You move into the city, away from your family. Luckily you find a cheap goshiwon. Although, the day you move in weird things started to happen. You keep seeing this woman... A woman with long black hair covering her face, scrawny body, with long deformed limbs. And the more you fear it, the stronger it gets. And it won't stop until you're dead... will you survive?


*What is goshiwon room?


A goshiwon (고시원) is a small room in Korea that you can rent, usually there's around 20+ rooms on one floor and the kitchen and bathroom is shared.



PRICE UPDATE

Price has been updated to it's original amount. Keep in mind the game is NOT completed, you will be getting all the updates as I work on the game.


CONTROLS

Arrow keys to Move

Space to Interact

Esc to go back or exit

F3 zoom

F4 full-screen

NOTE: There is no running in the game!



DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTION

1. Purchase the game

2. Extract HANA.zip

3. Run Game.exe

4. Enjoy!



CREDITS

Sound:

freesounds, pixabay, Everyday Cinematic Sounds (YT), OSA sounds, Yume freebie vol1, Spencer Y.K

Plugins:

Yanfly, Caz



All art done by me, except the two posters in the cafe. ( classic.vincent and .o0range )




WHAT'S NEXT?

For now only the 1st and 2nd Chapter is complete, There will be two more to come! I'm hoping it does well so I can invest a lot of time and effort into making this project a lot better and BIGGER!




HOW IT STARTED

This whole game idea basically came from a scary experience me and a person I know had.. I'm pretty sure we all have those creepy memories of something unexplainable happening to us.. well, I made mine into a game! but scarier..



Anyway I hope you enjoy the game!


You can follow my art account on Instagram " catowo_official " for more art and BTS.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains Blood, Gore and Self-harm.
Other Warnings: Trypophobia, Flashing Images.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A cute RPG Maker horror game
